about_the_game:
- Set up your own office. Expand your office as you wish. Transform from a small office to a large company.

- You have the option to furnish your office space. Choose from a variety of furniture items to keep your team comfortable and productive.

- Hire talented people. You will need staff for each department.

- You need to maintain balance in the office. You need to keep the happiness of the people you hire at a high level. You don’t want to lose your talented employees to other companies.

- Follow those who try to escape from work with a camera and make them return to their work. Because you will have a specific schedule to finish the work.

- First, take jobs from different companies. Then start doing your own projects.
detailed_description:
- Set up your own office. Expand your office as you wish. Transform from a small office to a large company.

- You have the option to furnish your office space. Choose from a variety of furniture items to keep your team comfortable and productive.

- Hire talented people. You will need staff for each department.

- You need to maintain balance in the office. You need to keep the happiness of the people you hire at a high level. You don’t want to lose your talented employees to other companies.

- Follow those who try to escape from work with a camera and make them return to their work. Because you will have a specific schedule to finish the work.

- First, take jobs from different companies. Then start doing your own projects.
name: Bosslife Office Manager

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 3550 / RYZEN 5 2500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 / AMD R9 270X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows (64-bit) 10
  • Processor: i5 7600K / Ryzen 5 2600x
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Set up your own office. Expand your office as you wish. Transform from a small office to a large company.Don't forget to make your employees happy too.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Turkish, Ukrainian
